overview: Little Ramadan is a brat. Behind his mischief, Ramadan has a talent for storytelling. Ramadan's father, Abuya, aware of his talent. When teaching the Koran and seeing Ramadan acting, he gave a penalty on him to tell a story. Although punishing, Abuya always enjoy the tales presented by Ramadan. Secretly Nayla, neighbor and friend, also likes the story.
title: Ada Surga Di Rumahmu
